details.title: Dredd
details.writer: John Wagner, Carlos Ezquerra, Alex Garland
details.actors: Karl Urban, Olivia Thirlby, Lena Headey
details.plot: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.
details.country: United Kingdom, South Africa, United States, India

details.title: The Double
details.writer: Fyodor Dostoevsky, Richard Ayoade, Avi Korine
details.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Mia Wasikowska, Wallace Shawn
details.plot: The unenviable life of a government-agency clerk takes a horrific turn with the arrival of a new co-worker who is both his exact physical double and his opposite otherwise--he's a confident, charismatic ladies' man.

details.title: Wild Tales
details.writer: Julian Loyola, Damián Szifron, Germán Servidio
details.actors: Darío Grandinetti, María Marull, Mónica Villa
details.plot: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.
details.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 51 wins & 58 nominations total

details.title: The Dressmaker
details.writer: Rosalie Ham, Jocelyn Moorhouse, P.J. Hogan
details.actors: Kate Winslet, Judy Davis, Liam Hemsworth
details.plot: A glamorous woman returns to her small town in rural Australia. With her sewing machine and haute couture style, she transforms the women and exacts sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.

details.title: The Dressmaker
details.writer: Rosalie Ham, Jocelyn Moorhouse, P.J. Hogan
details.actors: Kate Winslet, Judy Davis, Liam Hemsworth

details.title: Seve: The Movie
details.actors: José Luis Gutiérrez, José Navar, Tiger Woods
details.plot: Despite being blocked at almost every turn in pursuit of the sport he loved, Seve Ballesteros fought against adversity to become the most spectacular and charismatic golfer to ever play the game.

details.title: Anti-Social
details.actors: Gregg Sulkin, Meghan Markle, Josh Myers
details.plot: Central London, today: Dee is an anarchic street-artist confronting the system; Marcus is an armed robber on a jewelry-store crime-wave. For the two brothers, being Anti-Social is a way of life.

details.title: Rööperi
details.writer: Marko Leino, Harri Nykänen, Tom Sjöberg
details.actors: Samuli Edelmann, Peter Franzén, Kari Hietalahti
details.plot: Professional criminals in Finland from 1966 to 1979.

details.title: A Study in Pink
details.writer: Steven Moffat, Mark Gatiss, Arthur Conan Doyle
details.actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Rupert Graves
details.plot: War vet Dr. John Watson returns to London in need of a place to stay. He meets Sherlock Holmes, a consulting detective, and the two soon find themselves digging into a string of serial "suicides."

details.title: The Art of the Steal
details.actors: Kurt Russell, Jay Baruchel, Katheryn Winnick
details.plot: Crunch Calhoun, a semi-reformed art thief, agrees to get his old gang back together to pull off one last heist.
